text: "Stupid" is a song written by Sarah McLachlan and produced by Pierre Marchand for McLachlan's eighth album Afterglow (2003). It was released as the album's second single in Australia and the United States in mid-2004. The music video features McLachlan in different time periods and was directed by Sophie Muller. The song became McLachlan's highest-charting single release in Australia, debuting at number thirty-seven in early June 2004."Stupid - Australian chart run". Australian-charts.com. Retrieved 5 February 2009. It spent seven weeks on the Australian ARIA Singles Chart, two of which were in the top fifty."ARIA Top 100 Singles - Week Commencing 26th July 2004". ARIA Charts. Retrieved 5 February 2009.
